name: Send data about websites from Alexa Internet to Google Sheets each month
description: Get the Traffic History from Alexa Internet for the previous month for each website address stored in Google Sheets spreadsheet. Then, save the data to a selected Google Sheets spreadsheet. This scenario may be triggered every first day of a month and [this example](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1jNBucBigNAxHecvAG8MUMvlARQUfuWk2o8DB5dBjNGc/edit?usp=sharing) sheet can be used.
